content: I am so fucking tired of this misogyny, of people trying to “fix” me, to change me. I am not perfect, but neither do I need fixing. If, as they say, I give up everything, my confidence, my personality, my job, my aims, my desires — if I give everything up, everything I am; just for the chance to be with someone; isn’t that suicide? And a relationship where I am just a dead body, is it worth it?
